insights: ðŸ’¡ INSIGHT [Swup.js Integration]: Script Re-execution: Swup reloads scripts in <head> by default. Inline scripts in <body> must be written to be compatible with re-execution or moved to external files to prevent memory leaks or duplicate event listeners.
ðŸ’¡ INSIGHT [Security / Red Team]: NEVER use shell: true in child_process.spawn. Always pass arguments as an array to prevent shell injection vulnerabilities.
ðŸ’¡ INSIGHT [UI/UX / Aesthetic Safety]: Contrast Failure: Never generate text colors that result in low contrast (e.g., black on black). Always verify tokens against the theme context.

ðŸ’¡ INSIGHT [Tailwind 4 / Stylelint]: Update .stylelintrc.json to ignore Tailwind-specific at-rules (@theme, @plugin, @layer) and newer CSS properties (text-wrap, scrollbar-gutter) to avoid false positives.
ðŸ’¡ INSIGHT [Color Systems (OKLCH)]: Append "deg" to hue values in oklch() colors (e.g., oklch(22% 0.05 230deg)) to ensure full compatibility with modern CSS parsers and linters.
ðŸ’¡ INSIGHT [Design System Enforcement]: Disallow hardcoded hex/rgba values in component styles. Enforce mapping to CSS variables defined in global.css via Stylelint disallowed-list.

ðŸ’¡ INSIGHT [Swup.js Integration]: Script Re-execution: Swup reloads scripts in <head> by default. Inline scripts in <body> must be written to be compatible with re-execution or moved to external files to prevent memory leaks or duplicate event listeners.
